Business_spcService.Comments: This BS is used to process the MNP related scenarios
Business_spcService.Name: TM BS MNP Util

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20131112 | 1.00 | PPB | First version _newline20131217 | 1.01 | PPB | Functions for PortOut processing incorporated _newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction Service_usPreInvokeMethod(MethodName, Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline if("Process_usMNP" == MethodName)//this is used for portin processing _newline return func_usProcess_usMNP(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("FollowOnOrder" == MethodName) _newline return func_usCreateFollowOnOrder(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("ProcessNumberPortOut" == MethodName) _newline return func_usProcessNumberPortOut(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("FetchAttachment"==MethodName) _newline return func_usFetchAttachment(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("CheckPortOut"==MethodName) _newline return func_usCheckPortOut(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("CreateOrUpdateTicket"==MethodName) _newline { _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Broadcast","Y"); _newline return func_usCreateOrUpdateTicket(Inputs, Outputs); _newline } _newline else if("GetRTB"==MethodName) _newline return func_usGetRTB(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("QueryBalanceSummary"==MethodName) _newline return func_usQueryBalanceSummary(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("GetOrderAttachment"==MethodName) _newline return func_usGetOrderAttachment(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("ProcessPortOutManually"==MethodName) _newline return func_usProcessPortOutManually(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("CreateEDR_usBestMateCleanup"==MethodName) _newline return func_usCreateEDR_usBestMateCleanup(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("CreateReportingTicket"==MethodName) _newline return func_usCreateReportingTicket(Inputs, Outputs); _newline else if("ValidateNPOrder"==MethodName) _newline return func_usValidateNPOrder(Inputs, Outputs); _newlineelse if("ProcessPortOutDelayed"==MethodName)_newline return func_usProcessPortOutDelayed(Inputs, Outputs);_newline_newline else _newline return (ContinueOperation); _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: Service_usPreInvokeMethod

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140130 | 1.00 | PPB | Enhanced to send out status details using an AIA Provided web service_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usCheckPortOut(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//Activity for debt check: starts with Activity UId = NP10_us*****_newline//RCR queries such activities in 'In Progress' status and passes to this function_newline//here the activity context is used to query the bill profile and balance details_newline var strErrCode="OK";_newline var strErrMesg="";_newline var nHrs=ToInteger(TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","VFQA_usPARAMS","PORTOUT_usDEBT_usCLEARANCE_usHRS"));_newline var boAct,bcAct;_newline var boMain,bcAcc,bcAsset,bcCIP,bcBalVBC;_newline var strAccntId="",strAssetId="",strCIPId="";_newline var strActId=Inputs.GetProperty("ActivityId");//1-654JXH_newline var dtActCreated,dtNow=new Date();_newline var nPermittedDues=0.0,nBalance=0.0;_newline var strActStatus="", strActComment="",strActStatusPrev="",strTTId="";_newline boAct = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Action");_newline bcAct = boAct.GetBusComp("Action");_newline bcAct.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcAct.ActivateField("Comment");_newline bcAct.ActivateField("Activity SR Id");_newline bcAct.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAct.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAct.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strActId + "'");_newline bcAct.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAct.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode="NO_usACTION_usRECORD";_newline strErrMesg="Action record was not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline//these are stored from SR parent record as OOB feature_newline dtActCreated = new Date(bcAct.GetFieldValue("Created"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("DateCreated",dtActCreated);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("DateNow",dtNow);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("DateDiff",dtNow - dtActCreated);_newline strTTId = bcAct.GetFieldValue("Activity SR Id");_newline strAccntId = bcAct.GetFieldValue("Account Id");_newline strAssetId = bcAct.GetFieldValue("Asset Id");_newline strActStatusPrev=bcAct.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline//query account_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline bcAcc = boMain.GetBusComp("Account");_newline bcAcc.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAcc.ActivateField("Type");_newline bcAcc.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAcc.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAccntId + "'");_newline TheApplication().SetProfileAttr("Service Account Id",strAccntId);_newline bcAcc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAcc.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline if("Residential"==bcAcc.GetFieldValue("Type"))_newline nPermittedDues=ToNumber(TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","VFQA_usPARAMS","DUES_usPORT_usOUT_usRESI"));_newline else_newline nPermittedDues=ToNumber(TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","VFQA_usPARAMS","DUES_usPORT_usOUT_usBUSI"));_newline//query asset to get CIP Id_newline bcAsset= boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAssetId + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strCIPId=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id");_newline_newline bcCIP = boMain.GetBusComp("CMU Com Invoice Profile");_newline bcCIP.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcCIP.ClearToQuery();_newline bcCIP.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strCIPId + "'");_newline bcCIP.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcCIP.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline try_newline {_newline bcBalVBC = boMain.GetBusComp("CMU Balance Summary VBC");_newline bcBalVBC.ActivateField("Due Now");_newline bcBalVBC.ActivateField("Total");_newline bcBalVBC.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcBalVBC.ClearToQuery();_newline bcBalVBC.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcBalVBC.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline nBalance = ToNumber(bcBalVBC.GetFieldValue("Due Now"));_newline if(nPermittedDues >= nBalance)_newline {_newline strActStatus="Success";_newline strActComment="Customer has cleared all the issued bills.";_newline }_newline else_newline {//mark as failed only if time limit has expired_newline if(nHrs*3600.0*1000.0 < dtNow - dtActCreated)//date diff is in milliseconds_newline {_newline strActStatus="Failed";_newline strActComment="The customer has not settled the outstanding debt within prescribed time limit, [Allowed:" +nPermittedDues + ", Actual: "+ nBalance+"].";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strActStatus="In Progress";_newline strActComment="The customer has not settled the outstanding debt and can do so in " + nHrs + " hours, [Allowed:" +nPermittedDues + ", Actual: "+ nBalance+"].";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strActStatus="In Progress";_newline strActComment="Debt check failed due to system issues:NO_usBAL_usVBC_usREC";_newline }_newline }_newline catch (e)_newline {_newline strActStatus="In Progress";_newline strActComment="Debt check failed due to system issues:"+e.errCode;_newline }_newline strErrCode="OK";_newline strErrMesg="Status:" + strActStatus + ", " + strActComment;_newline//set the values on Action BC record_newline Outputs.SetProperty("ActStatus",strActStatus);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("ActComment",strActComment);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("nBalance",nBalance);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("nPermittedDues",nPermittedDues);_newline if(""!=strActStatus)_newline {_newline bcAct.SetFieldValue("Status", strActStatus);_newline bcAct.SetFieldValue("Comment",strActComment);_newline bcAct.WriteRecord();_newline if(strActStatusPrev!=strActStatus)_newline {//has changed invoke a broadcast_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Broadcast","Y");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("TTId", strTTId);_newline func_usCreateOrUpdateTicket(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline bcAct=null;_newline boAct=null;_newline bcAcc=null;_newline bcAsset=null;_newline bcCIP=null;_newline bcBalVBC=null;_newline boMain=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCheckPortOut

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140213 | 1.00 | PPB | Function to create an EDR record for portedout number - best mate cleanup_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usCreateEDR_usBestMateCleanup(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//take the number which is porting out and create _newline//must add index on S_usASSET_usXA.CHAR_usVAL_newline var strErrCode="",strErrMesg="";_newline var bsUtil,psOp,psIp;_newline var strNumber=Inputs.GetProperty("PhoneNumber");_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName","TMBatchRecordCreator");_newline psIp.SetProperty("BatchType", "AutomatedProcessing");_newline psIp.SetProperty("BatchId", "RemoveBestMateNP");_newline psIp.SetProperty("Attrib02", "RemoveBestMateNP");_newline psIp.SetProperty("RecordId", strNumber);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Attrib01", strNumber);_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess",psIp,psOp);_newline strErrCode=psOp.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline strErrMesg=psOp.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline bsUtil = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline psIp = null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCreateEDR_usBestMateCleanup

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20131224 | 1.00 | PPB | Function to create a Ticket, add activity template _newline20140128 | 1.10 | PPB | Re-processing enabled_newline20140130 | 1.20 | PPB | Enhanced to send out status details using an AIA Provided web service_newline20140207 | 1.30 | PPB | Conditional accept disabled for business_newline20140210 | 1.40 | PPB | Ticket closure on Donor Accept and Reject_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usCreateOrUpdateTicket(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strQName = TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","VFQA_usPARAMS","NP_usQUEUE_usNAME");//old value MNP_usQUEUE_newline var actCode="",actStatus="",strMSISDN="",PortOutAcceptance = "";_newline var boSR,bcSR,bcActTempl,bcActTemplAct, bcPick;_newline var strNameOfTemplate, strL1, strL2, strL3, workingMode="",isTTClosed=false;_newline var strPhoneNum = Inputs.GetProperty("PhoneNumber");//this may not be a valid asset_newline strL1 = Inputs.GetProperty("SR Type");_newline strL2 = Inputs.GetProperty("SR Area");_newline strL3 = Inputs.GetProperty("SR Sub-Area");_newline var strAccntType = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Type");_newline if(""==strAccntType) _newline strAccntType="Residential";//so as to create dummy ticket-activity_newline var strTTId = Inputs.GetProperty("TTId");//can be invoked by reprocessor, blank for new requests_newline var strSRNum = Inputs.GetProperty("TTNumber");//can be invoked by reprocessor, blank for new requests_newline var strAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Root Asset Id");_newline var strAccntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id"); _newline var strConId = Inputs.GetProperty("Contact Id"); _newline var strLang = Inputs.GetProperty("Language");_newline var strPayType = Inputs.GetProperty("Payment Type");_newline if(""==strLang)//default anyway_newline strLang="English";_newline var strAddInfo = Inputs.GetProperty("Additional Info");_newline var bBroadcast = Inputs.GetProperty("Broadcast");//this will be Y or N to send out details over a webservice_newline// bBroadcast="Y";//test only_newline var psStatusDtl;_newline var bsUtil,psIp,psOp,p1,p2,p3,p4,p5;_newline var psStatusDtlCont = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline_newline boSR = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Service Request");_newline bcSR = boSR.GetBusComp("Service Request");_newline bcSR.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ActivateField("INS Product");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("INS Area");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("INS Sub-Area");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Ticket Type");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Account Id");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Asset Id");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Sub-Status");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Priority");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Serial Number");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Resolution Code");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("SR Number");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("VFQA Language");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("CEM Due Date");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("TT Source");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Agent Comments");//to set the balance if any_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Payment Type");//new custom field on OOB column_newline//Check existing non-closed ticket of same type for same asset._newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ClearToQuery();_newline if(""!=strTTId)_newline {_newline workingMode="existing";_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strTTId + "'");_newline }_newline else if(""!=strSRNum)_newline {_newline workingMode="existing";_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[SR Number]='" + strSRNum + "'");_newline }_newline else if(""!=strAccntId && "" !=strAssetId)_newline {_newline workingMode="new";_newline //bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Account Id]='" + strAccntId + "' AND [Asset Id]='" + strAssetId + "' AND ([Status]='Not Solved')");_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Account Id]='" + strAccntId + "' AND [Asset Id]='" + strAssetId + "' AND [INS Product]='" + strL1 + "' AND [INS Area]='" + strL2 + "' AND [INS Sub-Area]='" + strL3 + "' AND ([Status]='Not Solved')");//Nandeesh: Added to pass Type, Area & SubArea values_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline workingMode="new";_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='NON_usEXISTING'");//for non-existing number as input to PortOut_newline }_newline bcSR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcSR.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcSR.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Ticket Type", "Trouble Ticket");_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("INS Product", strL1);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("INS Area", strL2);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("INS Sub-Area",strL3);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Asset Id", strAssetId);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Contact Id", strConId);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("VFQA Language", strLang);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Agent Comments", strAddInfo);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("TT Source", "System");_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Payment Type", strPayType);_newline_newline bcSR.WriteRecord();_newline//invoke attachment fetcher, and set a record with 98_newline if(workingMode=="new")_newline {_newline strTTId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("TTId",strTTId);_newline func_usFetchAttachment(Inputs, Outputs);//PhoneNumber gets passed since it comes in already_newline if("OK"==Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"))_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"98","Success","Retrieval of attachment file(s) was successful.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"98","Failed","Retrieval of attachment failed.");_newline }_newline }_newline if("Solved" == bcSR.GetFieldValue("Status")) _newline isTTClosed=true;_newline strSRNum = bcSR.GetFieldValue("SR Number");_newline strMSISDN = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Serial Number");_newline strTTId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strNameOfTemplate = strL1 + strL2 + strL3 + "_us" + strAccntType;_newline//activity template name will be of the form L1L2L3AccountType [RequestMNPPort Verification_usResidential, RequestMNPPort Verification_usBusiness]_newline bcActTempl = boSR.GetBusComp("Activity Plan");_newline bcActTempl.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcActTempl.ClearToQuery();_newline if("new"==workingMode) _newline bcActTempl.SetSearchExpr("[Template]='" + strNameOfTemplate + "'");_newline bcActTempl.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline var isActTemplRec = bcActTempl.FirstRecord();_newline if(!isActTemplRec)//if the activities are not setup only then do this_newline {_newline bcActTempl.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcPick = bcActTempl.GetPicklistBusComp("Template");_newline bcPick.ClearToQuery();_newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strNameOfTemplate + "'");_newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcPick.Pick();_newline bcActTempl.WriteRecord();_newline isActTemplRec = true;_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "NO_usACT_usTEMPL");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "Activity template is not defined.");_newline bcActTempl.UndoRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline if(isActTemplRec)_newline {_newline//now query child activities and update their status based on child propertysets of inputs_newline bcActTemplAct = boSR.GetBusComp("Activity Plan Action");_newline bcActTemplAct.SetSortSpec("Description");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Description");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Comment");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Activity UID");_newline bcActTemplAct.ClearToQuery();_newline bcActTemplAct.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline var isRec = bcActTemplAct.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline actCode = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Description");_newline for(var i=0; i<Inputs.GetChildCount(); i++)//this will have child only for first time ticket creation_newline {//find matching propset by Description this will typically happen for new ticket only_newline if(actCode == Inputs.GetChild(i).GetProperty("Code") && "StatusInfo"==Inputs.GetChild(i).GetType())_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty(actCode,"match_usfound");_newline bcActTemplAct.SetFieldValue("Comment", Inputs.GetChild(i).GetProperty("Message"));_newline bcActTemplAct.SetFieldValue("Status", Inputs.GetChild(i).GetProperty("Status"));_newline bcActTemplAct.SetFieldValue("Activity UID","NP"+actCode+"_us"+strTTId);//this helps to search the record later_newline bcActTemplAct.WriteRecord();_newline break;_newline }_newline }_newline isRec = bcActTemplAct.NextRecord();_newline }_newline//query again to set the overall status of ticket, based on activity status_newline_newline bcActTemplAct.ClearToQuery();_newline bcActTemplAct.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec = bcActTemplAct.FirstRecord();_newline PortOutAcceptance = "Donor Accept";//to start with_newline var TicketStatus = "Solved";_newline var TicketSubStatus = "Complete";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var strActStatus = "";_newline var strActComment = "";_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline actCode = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Description");_newline strActComment = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Comment");_newline strActStatus = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + actCode + ":" + strActStatus + "[" + strActComment + "];";_newline if("98" != actCode && "Failed" == strActStatus)//skip 98 : attachment_newline {//any one such failure leads to Donor Reject_newline PortOutAcceptance = "Donor Reject";//TicketStatus = "Cancelled";_newline }_newline if("Success" != strActStatus && "Failed"!=strActStatus)//this is debt check and 1 day is allowed to settle the bills_newline {_newline if("Donor Reject"!=PortOutAcceptance)_newline {_newline if("Business"==strAccntType)_newline PortOutAcceptance = "";_newline else_newline PortOutAcceptance = "Conditional Accept";_newline }_newline }_newline//next 3 lines to prepare the propertset for status broadcast webservice_newline if("Failed"==strActStatus)_newline {_newline psStatusDtl = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); psStatusDtl.SetType("DonerRejectData");_newline psStatusDtl.SetProperty("Reason", strActComment); psStatusDtl.SetProperty("code", actCode);_newline psStatusDtlCont.AddChild(psStatusDtl);_newline }_newline isRec = bcActTemplAct.NextRecord();_newline }_newline if("Donor Accept" != PortOutAcceptance && "Donor Reject" != PortOutAcceptance)_newline {_newline TicketStatus = "Not Solved";_newline TicketSubStatus = "Unassigned";_newline }_newline if("new"==workingMode)//!isTTClosed_newline {_newline//assign to default q_newline bcPick=bcSR.GetPicklistBusComp("Owner");_newline bcPick.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcPick.ClearToQuery();_newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[Login Name]='" + strQName + "'");_newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord())_newline bcPick.Pick();_newline }_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Resolution Code", PortOutAcceptance);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Sub-Status", TicketSubStatus);_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Status", TicketStatus);_newline bcSR.WriteRecord();_newline//broadcast_newline try_newline {_newline p1=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); p1.SetType("UpdatePortOutStatusSiebelReqABCSImplRequestMessage:payload"); _newline p1.SetProperty("MessageId","dummy"); p1.SetProperty("MessageType","Integration Object");_newline p1.SetProperty("IntObjectName","OrderData");p1.SetProperty("IntObjectFormat","Siebel Hierarchical");_newline p2=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); p2.SetType("ListOfOrderData"); _newline p3=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); p3.SetType("OrderData"); _newline p3.SetProperty("TTID", strTTId); _newline p3.SetProperty("TT_usNumber", strSRNum); _newline p3.SetProperty("AIAStatus", PortOutAcceptance);_newline if(""==strMSISDN)_newline p3.SetProperty("PhoneNumber", strPhoneNum);_newline else_newline p3.SetProperty("PhoneNumber", strMSISDN);_newline// p3.SetProperty("CustomerName",""); p3.SetProperty("CustomerIDType",""); p3.SetProperty("ServiceType",""); _newline// p3.SetProperty("MultipleMSISDN",""); p3.SetProperty("CustomerType",""); p3.SetProperty("QuotaFlag","");_newline// p3.SetProperty("CustomerID",""); p3.SetProperty("MessageTypeID",""); p3.SetProperty("DonorSubscriptionType","");_newline p4=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); p4.SetType("ListOfDonorRejectList"); _newline p5=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); p5.SetType("DonorRejectList"); _newline psStatusDtlCont.SetType("ListOfDonerRejectData");_newline p5.AddChild(psStatusDtlCont);_newline p4.AddChild(p5);_newline p3.AddChild(p4);_newline p2.AddChild(p3);_newline p1.AddChild(p2);_newline Outputs.AddChild(p1);_newline if("Y" == bBroadcast)_newline {//prepare the request message and post to AIA_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); psIp.AddChild(p1);_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("UpdatePortOutStatusSiebelReqABCSImpl");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("process",psIp,psOp);//this is fire and forget_newline TheApplication().LogError("PORTOUT_usBROADCAST", "Posted status successfully: "+ PortOutAcceptance, strTTId, "PortOut", "Update", "", "", "", "")_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "ERR_usSTATUS_usINFO_usPOSTING");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "ERR_usSTATUS_usINFO_usPOSTING" + ":" + e.errCode + ":" + e.errText);_newline TheApplication().LogError("PORTOUT_usBROADCAST", "Status posting failed: "+ PortOutAcceptance, strTTId, "PortOut", "Update", "", "", "", "")_newline }_newline }_newline//cleanup_newline Outputs.SetProperty("TTNumber", strSRNum);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("TTId", strTTId);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", PortOutAcceptance);_newline bcActTemplAct = null;_newline bcActTempl = null;_newline bcSR = null;_newline boSR = null;_newline bsUtil=null;_newline psIp=null;_newline psOp=null;_newline psStatusDtl=null;_newline psStatusDtlCont=null;_newline p1=null;_newline p2=null;_newline p3=null;_newline p4=null;_newline p5=null;_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCreateOrUpdateTicket

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20131224 | 1.00 | PPB | simple and standalone function to prepare a propertyset _newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction func_usCreatePS(mps, errCode, errStatus, errMesg) _newline{//mps would be an existing propertyset and this function checks the child propset with same code value, if exists then updates, else adds _newline var ps _newline var childExists=false; _newline for(var i=0; i < mps.GetChildCount(); i++) _newline { _newline ps = mps.GetChild(i); _newline if("StatusInfo"==ps.GetType() && errCode==ps.GetProperty("Code")) _newline { _newline childExists = true; _newline break; _newline } _newline } _newline//add or update child _newline if(!childExists) _newline { _newline ps = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline ps.SetType("StatusInfo"); _newline ps.SetProperty("Code", errCode); _newline } _newline ps.SetProperty("Status", errStatus); _newline ps.SetProperty("Message", errMesg); _newline if(!childExists) _newline mps.AddChild(ps); _newline return; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCreatePS

Name]='" + strQName + "'");_newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord())_newline bcPick.Pick();_newline_newline bcSR.WriteRecord();_newline strTTNumRep=bcSR.GetFieldValue("SR Number");_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline //nothing, log_newline TheApplication().LogError("PORTOUT_usERR_usERR", "Problem ticket could not be created: boSR=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("ReportingTicketNumber",strTTNumRep);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
