Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140108 | 1.00 | PPB | Function to create disconnect order for portout_newline20140206 | 1.10 | PPB | Additional checks to verify and moved primary number_newline20140213 | 1.2 | PPB | Best mate processing EDR creation enabled_newline20140427 | 1.3 | PPB | problem with change primary number order and its prerequisite completion for disconnect order_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usExecutePortOut(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{//is internal function and not exposed as BS Method_newline var strAccntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id");_newline var strRootAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Root Asset Id");_newline var strTTNum = Inputs.GetProperty("TTNumber");//to set on order_newline var strExtRef = "PRIM_usCHANGE_us"+strTTNum;_newline var strErrCode = "OK", strErrMesg = "Implementation is in progress.";_newline var strPrimNum = "";_newline var strPhoneNum = "";_newline var strAssetIntegNewPrim="";//to fetch the assetintegid which will be marked as next primary number_newline var strBillAccntId = "";_newline var strPromAssetId = "", strPromAssetIntegId = "", strRootAssetIntegId = "",strOrderId = "";_newline var strOtherOrderItemId="",strOtherOrderId="",strChargeId="",nPenalty=0.0;_newline var strConId = "", strCIPId = "";_newline var boAccnt,bcAccnt,bcAsset,bcAgrItem,boOrder,bcOrder,bcOLI,bcPick,psIp,psOp,bsUtil,isRec,bcPick;_newline var strOrderCancelReason = "Port Out";//"Good Value From Competitor";_newline var strOLICancelReason = "Port Out";_newline try_newline {_newline//query account_newline boAccnt = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline bcAccnt = boAccnt.GetBusComp("Account");_newline bcAccnt.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAccnt.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAccnt.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAccntId + "'");_newline bcAccnt.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAccnt.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ACCNT_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Account not found: " + strAccntId;_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline//query asset_newline bcAsset = boAccnt.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Integration Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Prom Instance Asset Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Owner Contact Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Product Name");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Serial Number");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Billing Acount Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Billing Account Parent HQ DUNS");_newline_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status]='Active'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Active asset not found: " + strRootAssetId;_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strConId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Contact Id");_newline strCIPId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id");_newline strPhoneNum = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Serial Number");_newline strBillAccntId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Account Id");_newline strPrimNum = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Account Parent HQ DUNS");_newline//find promotion asset_newline strPromAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Prom Instance Asset Id");_newline strRootAssetIntegId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id");_newline if(""!=strPromAssetId)_newline {_newline//find other non promotion asset under the same promtion_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]<>'" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status] <> 'Inactive' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Prom Instance Asset Id]='" + strPromAssetId + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "CANNOT_usTERMINATE";_newline strErrMesg = "There exist other sevice(s) under the same promotion, disconnection will require manual intervention:" + strPromAssetId + ":" + bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline }_newline }_newline//if primary number is being disconnected_newline if(strPrimNum == strPhoneNum)_newline {_newline var strNonPrimAssetProdName = "";_newline var strMakePrimProdName = "";_newline var strRootAssetIntegIdNewPrim = "";_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Root Asset Id]<>'" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status] <> 'Inactive' AND [Billing Account Id]='" + strBillAccntId + "' AND [Prod Type]='Service Bundle'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {//must first execute a change primary number order_newline strErrCode = "TBD";_newline strErrMesg = "Primary number is being disconnnected, a change primary number order will first be created.";_newline strNonPrimAssetProdName = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Product Name");_newline strRootAssetIntegIdNewPrim = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id");_newline if("Mobile Service Bundle"==strNonPrimAssetProdName)_newline strMakePrimProdName="Make Primary MSISDN";_newline else_newline strMakePrimProdName="Make Primary VoIP";_newline//EV2 Post_us297 Def7459, 97474111432_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("Ext Ref Id",strExtRef);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Asset Integration Id",strRootAssetIntegIdNewPrim);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Submit","Y");_newline psIp.SetProperty("Product Names",strMakePrimProdName);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Action Codes","Add");_newline psIp.SetProperty("Parent Product Names","");_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("TM BS Product Utility App");_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("CreateModifyOrderGeneric", psIp, psOp);_newline strOtherOrderId = psOp.GetProperty("Order Id");_newline strOtherOrderItemId = psOp.GetProperty("Root Order Item Id");_newline strErrCode = psOp.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline strErrMesg = psOp.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline }_newline }_newline if("OK"==strErrCode)_newline {_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline if(""!=strPromAssetId)_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strPromAssetId + "'");_newline else_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strRootAssetId + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline if(""!=strPromAssetId)_newline strPromAssetIntegId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id");_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId", strAccntId);//1-A2QMN6_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMDisconnectWebService-Order");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", strRootAssetIntegId);_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strOrderId = psOp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId");_newline if(""!=strPromAssetId)_newline {//delete promotion if it exists, it will use same order internally_newline psIp.SetProperty("ActiveDocumentId",strOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMDisconnectWebService-Order");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", strPromAssetIntegId);_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);//what to check in outputs? any error?_newline//find charge item. calc penalty if applicable_newline bcAgrItem = boAccnt.GetBusComp("ISS Promotion Agreement Item Charges");_newline bcAgrItem.ActivateField("Promotion Id");_newline bcAgrItem.ActivateField("Promotion Name");_newline bcAgrItem.ActivateField("Charge Id");_newline bcAgrItem.ActivateField("Effective Date");_newline bcAgrItem.ActivateField("Start Date");_newline bcAgrItem.ActivateField("End Date");_newline bcAgrItem.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAgrItem.SetSearchExpr("[Asset Integration Id] = '" + strPromAssetIntegId + "'");_newline bcAgrItem.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAgrItem.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strChargeId = bcAgrItem.GetFieldValue("Charge Id");_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("FS Conditional Charge");_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("Advance To","");//Today()_newline psIp.SetProperty("Conditional Charge Item Id", strChargeId);_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("GetCondCharge",psIp,psOp);_newline nPenalty = psOp.GetProperty("Output Amount");_newline }_newline }_newline if(""!=strOrderId)_newline {_newline boOrder = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrder = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Service Request Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Service Request Number");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Cancel Reason");//termination reason _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Charged Flag");//paid flag_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrder.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline//set fields on order_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Contact Id",strConId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id",strCIPId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Charged Flag","Y");_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Cancel Reason",strOrderCancelReason);_newline bcPick=bcOrder.GetPicklistBusComp("Service Request Number");_newline bcPick.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcPick.ClearToQuery();_newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[SR Number]='" +strTTNum+ "'");_newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord())_newline bcPick.Pick();_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline//set Cancel Reason on the root OLI_newline bcOLI = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Cancel Reason");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Prod Prom Instance Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Unit Price");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Depends on Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Root Order Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Integration Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Asset Integration Id");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL");//04-EPZ0H _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec = bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Cancel Reason",strOLICancelReason);_newline if(""!=strOtherOrderItemId)//dependency_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Depends on Id",strOtherOrderItemId);_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline isRec = bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline//Add OLI for penalty charges_newline if(0.0!=nPenalty && ""!=strPromAssetId)_newline {_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Product]='Penalty Charges'");//04-EPZ0H _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOLI.FirstRecord())//if does not exist then create OLI_newline {_newline bcOLI.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcPick = bcOLI.GetPicklistBusComp("Product");_newline bcPick.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcPick.ClearToQuery();_newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='Penalty Charges'");_newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord())_newline bcPick.Pick();_newline }_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Prod Prom Instance Id", strPromAssetIntegId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Unit Price",nPenalty);_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline//EDR for best mate check_newline Inputs.SetProperty("PhoneNumber",strPhoneNum);_newline func_usCreateEDR_usBestMateCleanup(Inputs, Outputs);_newline//submit the order_newline//1.3 below_newline//20140427:PPB Order dependency and prim number change conflicting when handled by OSM, so need to hold the order till primchange order is complete._newline if(""==strOtherOrderItemId)_newline {//no prim change order, submit right away_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode","Deliver");_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Order submitted.";_newline }_newline//1.3 above_newline }_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Terminate order created.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "DISC_usORDER_usCREATION_usFAILED";_newline strErrMesg = psOp.GetProperty("Error Code") + ":" + psOp.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Asset with promotion instance id [" + strPromAssetId + "] / root asset id [" + strRootAssetId + "] was not found.";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "EXECUTE_usERR";_newline strErrMesg = e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("NPOrderID", strOrderId);_newline bcAccnt = null;_newline bcAsset = null;_newline boAccnt = null;_newline bcOLI = null;_newline bcOrder = null;_newline boOrder = null;_newline bcPick = null;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usExecutePortOut

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usFetchAttachment(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline/*_newline<attach_usclnparameters MessageId="1-LORG" MessageType="Integration Object" IntObjectName="attach" IntObjectFormat="Siebel Hierarchical">_newline <ListOfattach>_newline <attach msisdn="79131436" /> _newline </ListOfattach>_newline </attach_usclnparameters>_newline*/_newline var bsUtil, psIp, psOp, ps1, ps2, ps3,nFileCount=0;_newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("PhoneNumber");_newline strMSISDN = strMSISDN.substring(3);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("NumberUsed",strMSISDN);_newline//chop off first three 974 letters :-) god bless_newline// strMSISDN="79131436";//test hardcoded_newline var strTTId = Inputs.GetProperty("TTId");//against which attachment is to be fetched from external system_newline var strErrCode="OK", strErrMesg="";_newline try_newline {_newline//fetch the file attachment_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline ps1=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); ps1.SetType("attach:parameters");_newline ps1.SetProperty("MessageId","dummy");_newline ps1.SetProperty("MessageType","Integration Object");_newline ps1.SetProperty("IntObjectName","attach");_newline ps1.SetProperty("IntObjectFormat","Siebel Hierarchical");_newline ps2=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); ps2.SetType("ListOfattach"); _newline ps3=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); ps3.SetType("attach"); ps3.SetProperty("msisdn",strMSISDN); _newline ps2.AddChild(ps3);_newline ps1.AddChild(ps2);_newline psIp.AddChild(ps1);_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("OSMSendAttachImpl");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("attach", psIp, psOp);_newline nFileCount=psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChildCount();//need to check what goes on here_newline//map the output_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.AddChild(psOp.GetChild(0));_newline psIp.SetProperty("TTId", strTTId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("MapName", "VFQA MNP TT Attachment");_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("EAI Data Transformation Engine");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("Execute", psIp, psOp);_newline//upsert_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.AddChild(psOp.GetChild(0));_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("EAI Siebel Adapter");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("Upsert", psIp, psOp);_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode="FILE_usATTACH_usERR";_newline strErrMesg=e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("FileCount", nFileCount);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usFetchAttachment

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140203 | 1.00 | PPB | Method to query TMOrderAttachmentIO. Exposed as a web service for external systems for PortIn scenario_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usGetOrderAttachment(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var bsUtil;_newline var strErrCode="";_newline var strErrMesg="";_newline try_newline {_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("EAI Siebel Adapter");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("Query", Inputs, Outputs);_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode="ERR_usATTACHMENT_usRETRIEVAL";_newline strErrMesg=e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usGetOrderAttachment

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usGetRTB(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var boMain,bcAccnt,bcProfile,bcAst,bcRTB,nBalance=0,balVal=0;_newline var strErrCode="OK";_newline var strErrMesg="";_newline var strAccntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id");//1-55SXB3_newline var strAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Asset Id"); //1-563ESK _newline var strBillProfileId = Inputs.GetProperty("CIP Id"); //1-55SYMQ_newline boMain= TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account"); _newline bcAccnt=boMain.GetBusComp("Account");_newline bcAccnt.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAccnt.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='"+ strAccntId + "'");_newline bcAccnt.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAccnt.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcProfile = boMain.GetBusComp("Com Invoice Profile");_newline bcProfile.ActivateField("Id");_newline bcProfile.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcProfile.ActivateField("Account Name");_newline bcProfile.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcProfile.ClearToQuery();_newline bcProfile.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strBillProfileId + "'");_newline bcProfile.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcProfile.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline//CMU Com Invoice Profile:VFQ Asset:VFQ Real Time Balance VBC-Field:Total_newline bcAst=boMain.GetBusComp("VFQ Asset");_newline bcAst.ActivateField("Serial Number");_newline bcAst.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAst.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAst.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAssetId + "'");_newline bcAst.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAst.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline try_newline {_newline bcRTB=boMain.GetBusComp("VFQ Real Time Balance VBC");_newline bcRTB.ActivateField("Total");_newline bcRTB.ActivateField("Description");_newline bcRTB.ActivateField("AccountName");//this stores the type of balance_newline bcRTB.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcRTB.ClearToQuery();_newline bcRTB.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline var recCntRTB=0;_newline var isRTBRec=bcRTB.FirstRecord();_newline var rtbDescr="";//this contains word startig with Primary Balance_newline while(isRTBRec)_newline {_newline rtbDescr = bcRTB.GetFieldValue("AccountName");_newline balVal = bcRTB.GetFieldValue("Total")_newline recCntRTB++;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Op_us" + recCntRTB,rtbDescr + ":" + balVal);_newline if("Primary Balance"==rtbDescr.substring(0,15))_newline {_newline nBalance = balVal;_newline recCntRTB++;_newline break;_newline }_newline isRTBRec=bcRTB.NextRecord()_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrMesg=e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline strErrCode="RTB_usERR";_newline nBalance = "RTB_usERR";//e.errCode;_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrMesg="Asset record was not found.";_newline strErrCode="NO_usASSET_usRECORD";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrMesg="Com Invoice Profile record was not found.";_newline strErrCode="NO_usCIP_usRECORD";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrMesg="Account record was not found.";_newline strErrCode="NO_usACCOUNT_usRECORD";_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Balance",nBalance);_newline boMain=null;_newline bcAccnt=null;_newline bcProfile=null;_newline bcAst=null;_newline bcRTB=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usGetRTB

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20131216 | 1.00 | PPB | First version to support port out verification and processing_newline20140131 | 1.10 | PPB | Get paytype to set on SR, fetch language from voicemail asset_newline20140206 | 1.20 | PPB | 10,11 to be made manual for Business_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usProcessNumberPortOut(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//This function handles various scenarios like verify, cancel, execute for PortOut transactions_newline var strRootAssetId = "", strPromAssetId="", strConId="", strAccntId="", strAccntType="", strBillProfileId="",strMoreInfo="";_newline var fldNameIDType = "Market Type";_newline var fldNameIDNum = "DUNS Number";_newline var fldNameLang = "VFQA Preferred Language";_newline var boMain,bcAsset,bcAccnt,bcSR, bcBalVBC, bcProfile,bcXA;_newline var bcContct; // Added By [AMITB] for production issue 20-May-14_newline var bcRTB,bcAst;_newline var nPermittedDues = 0.0;_newline var bBalCheckRequired = false;_newline//verify, execute, cancel, getstatus_newline var strErrCode = "OK";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var strOperationType = Inputs.GetProperty("OperationType");_newline//verify_newline var strCustomerID = Inputs.GetProperty("CustomerID");_newline var strCustomerIDType = Inputs.GetProperty("CustomerIDType");_newline var strCustomerType = Inputs.GetProperty("CustomerType");_newline var strActualSubscrType= "";_newline var strDonorSubscrType = Inputs.GetProperty("DonorSubscriptionType");_newline var strCustomerName = Inputs.GetProperty("CustomerName");_newline var strPhoneNumber = Inputs.GetProperty("PhoneNumber");_newline var strServiceType = Inputs.GetProperty("ServiceType");_newline var strLang="";_newline var nBalance=0.0;_newline var strAssetId="";_newline//getstatus_newline var strTTId = Inputs.GetProperty("TTId");_newline var strSRNum = Inputs.GetProperty("TTNumber");_newline//validate inputs_newline if("verify" == strOperationType)_newline {_newline if("" == strCustomerID || "" == strCustomerIDType || "" == strCustomerName || "" == strCustomerType || "" == strDonorSubscrType || "" == strPhoneNumber || "" == strServiceType)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INCOMPLETE_usINPUTS";_newline strErrMesg = "For 'verify' operation specific inputs must be provided.\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "PhoneNumber\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "ServiceType [MSISDN, FixedLine]\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "CustomerType [Residential, Business]\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "CustomerIDType [Qatari Id, Passport etc]\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "CustomerID [Id number]\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "DonorSubscriptionType [Prepaid, Postpaid]\r";_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + "CustomerName\r";_newline }_newline }_newline else if("getstatus" == strOperationType || "cancel" == strOperationType || "execute" == strOperationType)_newline {_newline if("" == strTTId && "" == strSRNum)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INCOMPLETE_usINPUTS";_newline strErrMesg = "For operationtype '" + strOperationType + "', one of the two TTId, TTNumber must be provided.";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INVALID_usOPERATIONTYPE";_newline strErrMesg = "Only valid values for OperationType must be specified - verify, execute, cancel, getstatus.";_newline }_newline//now proceed_newline if("OK"!=strErrCode)_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline if("execute" == strOperationType || "cancel" == strOperationType || "getstatus" == strOperationType)_newline {_newline func_usProcessTicket(Inputs, Outputs);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline else if("verify" == strOperationType)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "Donor Reject";_newline//check asset by given phone number_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("VFQA Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");_newline bcAsset = boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Product Name");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Prod Type");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Operating Status");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Root Asset Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Owner Account Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Owner Contact Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Payment Type");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Prom Instance Asset Id");//the root bundle to search can be a part of the promotion alongwith other root bundle???_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Serial Number]='" + strPhoneNumber + "' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Product Type]<>'Promotion' AND ([Status]='Active' OR [Status]='Suspended')");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())//asset not found, return error and end_newline {_newline//check staff number_newline if("97477775" == strPhoneNumber.substring(0,8))//77775xxx_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"13","Failed","Staff number porting out.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"13","Success","Number porting out is not a Staff Number.");_newline strAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strRootAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Root Asset Id");_newline strPromAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Prom Instance Asset Id"); _newline strAccntId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Account Id");_newline strConId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Contact Id");_newline if("No Match Row Id"==strConId) _newline strConId="";_newline strBillProfileId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id");_newline if("Active" != bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Status"))//must be suspended - due to system or due to user request? what to do?_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"06","Failed","Service for Number currently barred or suspended.");_newline else_newline {_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"06","Success","Service for the number porting out is currently NOT barred or suspended.");_newline//check if the promotion has some other root bundle also, then disconnect will not be allowed, but must go for a upgrade/downgrade promotion_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]<>'" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status] <> 'Inactive' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Prom Instance Asset Id]='" + strPromAssetId + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"99","Success","There exist other sevice(s) under the same promotion, disconnection will require manual intervention.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"99","Success","No other service under the promotion of the current asset.");_newline//check status of the to-be-ported-out asset_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]='" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status] ='Active' AND ([Prod Type]='Service Plan' OR [Prod Type]='Commit Plan')");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"04","Failed","Could not detect the payment type because Plan asset was not found.");_newline else_newline {_newline//send out payment type_newline strActualSubscrType = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Payment Type");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Payment Type",strActualSubscrType);//must not be null_newline//fetch language from the voice mail asset attribute_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]='" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status] ='Active' AND [Prod Type] LIKE '*oice*ail*'");//crazy way to detect_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcXA=boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset XA");_newline bcXA.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcXA.ActivateField("Value");_newline bcXA.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='Language'");_newline bcXA.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcXA.FirstRecord())_newline strLang=bcXA.GetFieldValue("Value");_newline }_newline//active root asset found, now switch to Account BO and carry out further checks, requery to find the plan asset, pre/post pay type, customer type (resi/busi)_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline bcAccnt = boMain.GetBusComp("Account");_newline bcAccnt.ActivateField(fldNameIDType);//ID number_newline bcAccnt.ActivateField(fldNameIDNum);//ID Type_newline bcAccnt.ActivateField(fldNameLang);//Language_newline bcAccnt.ActivateField("Type");//Resi/Busi_newline bcAccnt.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAccnt.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAccnt.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAccntId + "'");_newline bcAccnt.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAccnt.FirstRecord())//anyway must get a record_newline {_newline if(""==strLang) _newline strLang = bcAccnt.GetFieldValue(fldNameLang);_newline strAccntType = bcAccnt.GetFieldValue("Type");_newline if("Residential"==strAccntType)_newline nPermittedDues=ToNumber(TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","VFQA_usPARAMS","DUES_usPORT_usOUT_usRESI"));_newline else_newline nPermittedDues=ToNumber(TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","VFQA_usPARAMS","DUES_usPORT_usOUT_usBUSI"));_newline_newline if(strDonorSubscrType == strActualSubscrType)//expected to be prepaid or postpaid - paytype actually_newline { _newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"04","Success","Correct donor service type " + strActualSubscrType + ".");_newline/*is it required to check Business/Residential also?_newline if(strAccntType == strCustomerType)_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"04","Success","Donor service type [" + strDonorSubscrType + "] is matching.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"04","Failed","Donor service type [" + strCustomerType + "] is not matching.");_newline*/ }_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"04","Failed","Incorrect donor service type (e.g. Prepaid, Postpaid, etc.).");_newline_newline if("Business" != strAccntType)_newline {_newline /*if(strCustomerName!=bcAccnt.GetFieldValue("Name"))_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"11","Failed","Number to be ported does not belong to said subscriber.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"11","Success","Number to be ported is registered under the subscribers name");[Nitesh] Comenting Code for defect 8978 */_newline // Added Contact BC query by [AMITB] _newline bcContct = boMain.GetBusComp("Contact"); _newline bcContct.ActivateField("ID Information");_newline bcContct.ActivateField("ID Type");_newline bcContct.ClearToQuery();_newline bcContct.SetViewMode(3);_newline bcContct.SetSearchSpec("Id", bcAccnt.GetFieldValue("Primary Contact Id"));_newline bcContct.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcContct.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline if(strCustomerIDType != bcContct.GetFieldValue("ID Type"))_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"12","Failed","ID type of the subscriber is not matching.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"12","Success","ID type of the subscriber is valid/available.");_newline if(strCustomerID != bcContct.GetFieldValue("ID Information"))_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"01","Failed","ID Number does not match.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"01","Success","ID Number is matching.");_newline }_newline else { func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"01","Failed","ID Number does not match.");}_newline}_newline//is asset the only asset under the bill profile?_newline if("Business" != strAccntType)_newline {_newline if("Prepaid" != strActualSubscrType)_newline {_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Billing Profile Id] ='" + strBillProfileId + "' AND [Root Asset Id]<>'" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Payment Type]='Postpaid' AND [Status]='Active' AND ([Prod Type]='Service Plan' OR [Prod Type]='Commit Plan')");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"10","Success","Debt check not applicable: Customer has more than one postpaid services.");_newline }_newline else//need to check balance since this is only single postpaid service on the profile_newline bBalCheckRequired = true;_newline }_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"10","Success","Debt check not applicable: Prepaid port-out requested.");_newline }_newline//now fetch the balance info_newline if("Prepaid" == strActualSubscrType)_newline {//just get prepaid balance only as info_newline bcProfile = boMain.GetBusComp("Com Invoice Profile");_newline bcProfile.ActivateField("Id");_newline bcProfile.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcProfile.ActivateField("Account Name");_newline bcProfile.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcProfile.ClearToQuery();_newline bcProfile.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strBillProfileId + "'");_newline bcProfile.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcProfile.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline//CMU Com Invoice Profile:VFQ Asset:VFQ Real Time Balance VBC-Field:Total_newline bcAst=boMain.GetBusComp("VFQ Asset");_newline bcAst.ActivateField("Serial Number");_newline bcAst.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAst.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAst.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAssetId + "'");_newline bcAst.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAst.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline try_newline {_newline bcRTB=boMain.GetBusComp("VFQ Real Time Balance VBC");_newline bcRTB.ActivateField("Total");_newline bcRTB.ActivateField("AccountName");//this contains the balance type_newline bcRTB.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcRTB.ClearToQuery();_newline bcRTB.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline var recCntRTB=0;_newline var isRTBRec=bcRTB.FirstRecord();_newline var rtbDescr="";//this contains word startig with Primary Balance_newline while(isRTBRec)_newline {_newline rtbDescr=bcRTB.GetFieldValue("AccountName");_newline if("Primary Balance"==rtbDescr.substring(0,15))_newline {_newline nBalance = bcRTB.GetFieldValue("Total");_newline recCntRTB++;_newline break;_newline }_newline isRTBRec=bcRTB.NextRecord()_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline nBalance = "RTB_usERR";//e.errCode;_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline strMoreInfo="Prepaid Balance: " + nBalance;_newline }_newline else_newline {//postpaid debt check_newline Inputs.SetProperty("CIP Id",strBillProfileId); _newline func_usQueryBalanceSummary(Inputs, Outputs);_newline if("OK"!=Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"))_newline {_newline if(bBalCheckRequired)_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"10","In Progress","Debt check failed due to technical / system issues.");_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline nBalance = ToNumber(Outputs.GetProperty("Due Now"));_newline strMoreInfo="Postpaid Balance: " + nBalance;_newline if(bBalCheckRequired)_newline {_newline if(nPermittedDues >= nBalance)_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"10","Success","Customer has cleared all the issued bills.");_newline else_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"10","In Progress","The customer has not settled the outstanding debt, [Allowed:" +nPermittedDues + ", Actual: "+ nBalance+"].");_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline//Create ticket_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Root Asset Id", strRootAssetId);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Contact Id", strConId);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("SR Type", "Request");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("SR Area", "MNP");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("SR Sub-Area", "Port Verification");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Language", strLang);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Additional Info", strMoreInfo);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Account Type", strAccntType);_newline func_usCreateOrUpdateTicket(Inputs, Outputs);_newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline }_newline else_newline {//asset not found, better create a ticket anyway_newline func_usCreatePS(Inputs,"11","Failed","Number to be ported is not a valid Vodafone number.");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("TTNumber", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("TTId", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "Donor Reject");_newline }_newline bcAccnt=null;_newline bcSR=null;_newline bcXA=null;_newline bcBalVBC = null;_newline bcProfile = null;_newline bcAsset = null;_newline boMain = null;_newline strErrMesg = "";_newline for(var i=0; i<Inputs.GetChildCount(); i++)_newline {_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + Inputs.GetChild(i).GetProperty("Code") + ":" + Inputs.GetChild(i).GetProperty("Status") + "[" + Inputs.GetChild(i).GetProperty("Message") + "];\r";_newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessNumberPortOut

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140427 | 1.00 | PPB | Function to process the ticket in delayed mode ONLY after a prerequisite prim number change order is completed_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usProcessPortOutDelayed(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//query the orders which have the prerequisite oli_newline var strPreReqOLIId = Inputs.GetProperty("Depends_uson_usOLI_usId");_newline var strErrCode = "";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var strOrderId = "";_newline var nCnt=0;_newline var strOLIstat = "";_newline var bsUtil,psIp,psOp,boOLI,bcOLI,isRec;_newline try_newline {_newline if(""==strPreReqOLIId)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "NOTHING_usTO_usPROCESS";_newline strErrMesg = "There is no OLI Id specified.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode","Deliver");_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService");_newline boOLI=TheApplication().GetBusObject("CMU Order Line Item");_newline bcOLI=boOLI.GetBusComp("MACD Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Order Header Id");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Depends on Id]='"+ strPreReqOLIId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline strOrderId=bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Order Header Id");_newline strOLIstat=bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline if(strOLIstat == "Pending")_newline {_newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId);_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline nCnt++;_newline }_newline }_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Order(s) submitted: " + nCnt;_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "EXECUTE_usERR";_newline strErrMesg = e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline bsUtil=null;_newline psIp=null;_newline psOp=null;_newline bcOLI=null;_newline boOLI=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessPortOutDelayed

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140201 | 1.00 | PPB | First version_newline20140207 | 1.10 | PPB | Simplified to just send out updated_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usProcessPortOutManually(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{//this is to be invoked when a user clicks the process / submit butoon on the Ticket window_newline//check if already processed - this is so when the Resolution code is Donor Accept or Donor Reject_newline//in case of conditional accept, run the debt check activity once if not in In Progress status, run the status evaluator once_newline//then run execute_newline var boSR,bcSR,bcAct;_newline var strResCode = "";_newline var strTTNum = "";_newline var strActId = "";_newline var strActStatus= "";_newline var strTTId = Inputs.GetProperty("TTId");_newline var strErrCode = "OK";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline boSR=TheApplication().GetBusObject("Service Request");_newline bcSR=boSR.GetBusComp("Service Request");_newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Resolution Code");_newline bcSR.ClearToQuery();_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strTTId + "'");_newline bcSR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcSR.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INVALID_usTT_usID";_newline strErrMesg = "Invalid Ticket Id.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Broadcast","Y");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("TTId", strTTId);_newline func_usCreateOrUpdateTicket(Inputs, Outputs);_newline strErrCode="OK";_newline strErrMesg="Ticket status was posted to external system.";_newline_newline/*_newline strResCode = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Resolution Code");_newline strTTNum = bcSR.GetFieldValue("SR Number");_newline Inputs.SetProperty("TTNum",strTTNum);_newline if("Conditional Accept"==strResCode || ""==strResCode)_newline {//check debt activity_newline bcAct = boSR.GetBusComp("Action");_newline bcAct.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcAct.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAct.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAct.SetSearchExpr("[Description]='10'");_newline bcAct.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAct.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strActId = bcAct.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strActStatus = bcAct.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline if("In Progress"==strActStatus)_newline {_newline Inputs.SetProperty("ActivityId",strActId);_newline func_usCheckPortOut(Inputs, Outputs);//this will internally post a status update also_newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "DEBT_usCHECK_usNOT_usPENDING";_newline strErrMesg = "Debt check for port out requuest is in " + strActStatus + " status.";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "DEBT_usCHECK_usNOT_usAPPLICABLE";_newline strErrMesg = "Debt check for port out requuest is not applicable.";_newline }_newline }_newline else if("Donor Reject"==strResCode)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "NOTHING_usTO_usPROCESS";_newline strErrMesg = "Port out requuest is in " + strResCode + " status.";_newline }_newline else//Donor Accept_newline {_newline strErrCode = "NOTHING_usTO_usPROCESS";_newline strErrMesg = "Port out requuest is in " + strResCode + " status.";_newline//now create order if _newline// Inputs.SetProperty("OperationType","execute");_newline// func_usProcessTicket(Inputs, Outputs);_newline// strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline// strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline }_newline*/_newline }_newline bcAct=null;_newline bcSR=null;_newline boSR=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessPortOutManually

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20131224 | 1.00 | PPB | Function to process the ticket_newline20140217 | 1.1 | PPB | Reporting ticket creation if execute fails only on disconnct order creation_newline20140227 | 1.2 | PPB | Reporting ticket creation if execute fails for all reasons_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usProcessTicket(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var boSR,bcSR,bcOrder,bcActTempl,bcActTemplAct;_newline var actCode="",actStatus="", strTicketSubStatus="", strTicketStatus="";_newline var strSRNum="", strTTId="", strNameOfTemplate="", strL1="", strL2="", strL3="", strAccntType="",strResCode="";_newline var strErrCode = "", strErrMesg = "", strActStatus = "", strActComment = "";_newline var strAccntId="", strRootAssetId="",strMSISDN="";_newline var strOperationType = Inputs.GetProperty("OperationType");_newline var psIp,psOp;_newline_newline boSR = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Service Request");_newline bcSR = boSR.GetBusComp("Service Request");_newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ActivateField("INS Product");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("INS Area");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("INS Sub-Area");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Ticket Type");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Account Id");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Asset Id");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Sub-Status");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Resolution Code");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("SR Number");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Serial Number");_newline bcSR.ActivateField("Type");//account type B/R_newline_newline strSRNum = Inputs.GetProperty("TTNumber");_newline strTTId = Inputs.GetProperty("TTId");_newline strAccntType = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Type");_newline//Check existing non-closed ticket of same type for same asset._newline bcSR.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ClearToQuery();_newline if(""!=strSRNum)_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[SR Number]='" + strSRNum + "'");_newline else_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strTTId + "'");_newline bcSR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcSR.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strSRNum = "";_newline strErrCode = "INVALID_usTTNum";_newline strErrMesg = "Ticket id / number provided is invalid.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strTTId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strSRNum = bcSR.GetFieldValue("SR Number");_newline strMSISDN = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Serial Number");_newline strTicketStatus = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline strTicketSubStatus = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Sub-Status");_newline strL1 = bcSR.GetFieldValue("INS Product");_newline strL2 = bcSR.GetFieldValue("INS Area");_newline strL3 = bcSR.GetFieldValue("INS Sub-Area");_newline strRootAssetId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Asset Id");_newline strAccntId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Account Id");_newline strAccntType = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Type");_newline strResCode = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Resolution Code");_newline if(""==strAccntType) _newline strAccntType="Residential";_newline strNameOfTemplate = strL1 + strL2 + strL3 + "_us" + strAccntType;_newline//check if this really is a MNP ticket _newline if("Request" != strL1 || "MNP" != strL2 || "Port Verification" != strL3)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INVALID_usTT";_newline strErrMesg = "Ticket is not a MNP ticket.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline bcOrder=boSR.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Order Number");_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);//no need to clearquery and set search spec_newline if("cancel"==strOperationType)_newline {_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ALREADY_usEXECUTED";_newline strErrMesg = "Order " + bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Order Number") + " already created for the port out request.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Status", "Solved");_newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Sub-Status", "Cancelled");_newline bcSR.WriteRecord();_newline strOperationType = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Port Out request successfully cancelled.";_newline }_newline }_newline else if("execute"==strOperationType)_newline {//donot care about ticket status/resolution code as per SA Team (Himanshu)_newline//check if an order is already associated with this SR_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ALREADY_usEXECUTED";_newline strErrMesg = "Order " + bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Order Number") + " already created for the port out request.";_newline }_newline else _newline {_newline if("Cancelled"==strTicketSubStatus)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "CANNOT_usEXECUTE";_newline strErrMesg = "Port out request has been already cancelled.";_newline }_newline else_newline { _newline if("Donor Accept"==strResCode)_newline {_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Root Asset Id", strRootAssetId);_newline func_usExecutePortOut(Inputs, Outputs);_newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "CANNOT_usEXECUTE";_newline strErrMesg = "Port out request is not in state of 'Donor Accept' [current status: " + strResCode + "].";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline if("OK"!=strErrCode)_newline {_newline//1.2_newline//1.1create a ticket_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("Root Asset Id", strRootAssetId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("TTNum", strSRNum);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Error Info", "PortOut Ticket:" + strSRNum + "; Error Code:" + strErrCode + "; Error Message:"+strErrMesg);_newline psIp.SetProperty("PhoneNumber", strMSISDN);_newline func_usCreateReportingTicket(psIp,psOp);_newline }_newline }_newline else if("getstatus"==strOperationType)_newline {_newline var _newline bcActTempl = boSR.GetBusComp("Activity Plan");_newline bcActTempl.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcActTempl.ClearToQuery();_newline bcActTempl.SetSearchExpr("[Template]='" + strNameOfTemplate + "'");_newline bcActTempl.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline var isActTemplRec = bcActTempl.FirstRecord();_newline if(isActTemplRec)_newline {_newline//now query child activities and update their status based on child propertysets of inputs_newline var psStatusDtl;_newline var psStatusDtlCont = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bcActTemplAct = boSR.GetBusComp("Activity Plan Action");_newline bcActTemplAct.SetSortSpec("Description");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Description");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Comment");_newline bcActTemplAct.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcActTemplAct.ClearToQuery();_newline bcActTemplAct.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline var isRec = bcActTemplAct.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline actCode = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Description");_newline strActComment = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Comment");_newline strActStatus = bcActTemplAct.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline strErrMesg = strErrMesg + actCode + ":" + strActStatus + "[" + strActComment + "];\r";_newline_newline if("Failed"==strActStatus)_newline {_newline psStatusDtl = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); psStatusDtl.SetType("DonerRejectData");_newline psStatusDtl.SetProperty("Reason", strActComment); psStatusDtl.SetProperty("code", actCode);_newline psStatusDtlCont.AddChild(psStatusDtl);_newline }_newline isRec = bcActTemplAct.NextRecord();_newline }_newline strErrCode = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Resolution Code");_newline Inputs.AddChild(psStatusDtlCont);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("TTId",strTTId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("TT_usNumber",strSRNum); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("PhoneNumber",strMSISDN);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("PortOutAcceptance",strErrCode);_newline_newline func_usCreateResponse(Inputs,Outputs);_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "NO_usDETAILS_usAVAIALBLE";_newline strErrMesg = "Verification details for the port out request ticket not available.";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INVALID_usOPERATION";_newline strErrMesg = "Invalid operation requested: " + strOperationType;_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("TTNumber", strSRNum);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("TTId", strTTId);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("SRStatus", strTicketStatus);//this is to be used to do further processing_newline bcActTemplAct = null;_newline bcActTempl = null;_newline bcOrder=null;_newline bcSR = null;_newline boSR = null;_newline psIp = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessTicket

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140201 | 1.00 | PPB | First version_newline20140206 | 1.10 | PPB | Processing for NP_usDEACTIVATED_newline20140213 | 1.20 | PPB | Mark original order OLI to Open again :-)_newline20140217 | 1.3 | PPB | Set processed flag = y on root OLI_newline20140427 | 1.4 | PPB | set NRH=Y_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usProcess_usMNP(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strErrCode = "OK", strErrMesg = "Record processed.";_newline var strROLIStatus="";_newline var strRecordType = Inputs.GetProperty("RecordType");//main batch type_newline var strRecordSubType = Inputs.GetProperty("RecordSubType");//child record type_newline var strNPOLIId = Inputs.GetProperty("RecordRef");//item id from the original order if subtype=NP_usACK_newline var strRecordRef = "NP_usPORTIN_us" + strNPOLIId;_newline var strOrderId = Inputs.GetProperty("OrderId");_newline var strNewOrderId = "", strNewOrderNum = "";_newline var strProdName = "";_newline var isPortInOLIComplete = false;_newline var strProdNamePortIn= "Mobile Port-In";_newline var strAID_usProm, strAID_usROLI, strAID_usOLI;//Asset Integration Id for Promotion, Root OLI and the affected OLI_newline var strROLIId = "";//root OLI Id of the OLI for which update has been receieved_newline var strPromOLIId = "";//promotion OLI Id for the selected root_newline var strTempNum, strPortInNum;_newline var isRec,isAssetReady;_newline var strCIPId="",strContactId="",strAccntId="";_newline var boOrder, bcOrder, bcOLI, boAsset,bcAsset,bsUtil,psIp,psOp,bcXA;_newline try_newline {_newline if("PortInAckn"==strRecordType)_newline {//if not created already then create assets for original order on NP_us*_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");//this will be used multiple times hence up here_newline boOrder = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrder = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrder.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Order Number");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Back Office Order Number");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Charged Flag");_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline//check if already processed using reference link to num-change order_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Back Office Order Number]='" + strRecordRef + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strOrderId = bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strErrCode = "ALREADY_usPROCESSED";_newline strErrMesg = "Number change order already created.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline//first get the Asset Integration Id and root OLI for the portin OLI_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Order with Id = " + strOrderId + " not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline if("Complete"==bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Status"))_newline isPortInOLIComplete = true;_newline bcOLI = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Change Reason");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Order Number");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Root Order Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Parent Order Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product Type Code");//stores Promotion or Product_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Action Code");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Account Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Service Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Asset Integration Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Processed Flag");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strNPOLIId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "OLI_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Order Item with Id = " + strNPOLIId + " not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline {//got the OLI_newline strProdName = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Product");_newline strROLIId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Root Order Item Id");_newline strAID_usOLI = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Asset Integration Id");_newline if(strProdNamePortIn != strProdName)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "PRODUCT_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Order Item with Id = " + strNPOLIId + " is for product " + strProdName + ", but needs to be for " + strProdNamePortIn;_newline }_newline else_newline {//product ok, now get Asset Integration Id of promotion and root OLI_newline strROLIId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Root Order Item Id");_newline strPortInNum = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Service Id");_newline if("Complete"==bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Status"))_newline isPortInOLIComplete = true;_newline//query ROLI_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strROLIId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strROLIStatus= bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline strAID_usROLI = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Asset Integration Id");_newline strAID_usProm = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Prod Prom Instance Id");_newline strAccntId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Account Id");_newline strTempNum = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Service Id");_newline strContactId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Contact Id");_newline strCIPId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id");_newline//check assets created for the Root OLI or not_newline boAsset = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline bcAsset = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Integration Id]='" + strAID_usROLI + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isAssetReady=bcAsset.FirstRecord();_newline if(!isAssetReady)_newline {_newline if("Complete"==strROLIStatus)_newline {_newline//if ROLI is complete process assets right here :-) also for promotion of the original order_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SIS OM Apply Completed Service Order Line Item to Service Profile");_newline psIp.SetProperty("Order Header Id", strOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Root Id", strROLIId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Root Order Item Id", strROLIId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Asset Integration Id", strAID_usROLI);_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline//promotion asset gets created automatically because OSM sends its completion independently_newline//check asset again_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Integration Id]='" + strAID_usROLI + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isAssetReady=bcAsset.FirstRecord();_newline if(!isAssetReady)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "FAILED";_newline strErrMesg = "Assets for Root Order Item could not be created.";_newline }_newline else_newline {//1.2 below_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Root Order Item Id]='" + strROLIId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline if("Complete"==bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Status"))_newline {_newline if(strROLIId == bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Id") && "Y"!= bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Processed Flag")) _newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Processed Flag","Y");//1.3_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline if(!isPortInOLIComplete)_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Status","Open");_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {//if ROLI not complete set error as WAIT for later processing_newline strErrCode = "WAIT";_newline strErrMesg = "Assets for Root Order Item not yet created, since OLI is not complete:" + strAID_usROLI;_newline }_newline }_newline if("OK"==strErrCode && "NP_usDEACTIVATED"==strRecordSubType)_newline {_newline//create note in BC: SHM Order Notes - External, to refer the original order in the change number order and vice versa_newline//modify order and then set the new number_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", strAID_usROLI);_newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId",strAccntId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMModifyWebService-Order");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strNewOrderId=psOp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId");_newline//query order, set new service id_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strNewOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "CHG_usNUM_usORDER_usNOT_usCREATED";_newline strErrMesg = "Change number order could not be created.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strNewOrderNum=bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Order Number");_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Back Office Order Number", strRecordRef);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id",strCIPId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Contact Id",strContactId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Charged Flag","Y");_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Service Id]='" + strTempNum + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline if(isRec)//not any found_newline {_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id",strPortInNum);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Update");_newline if(""==bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Parent Order Item Id"))_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Change Reason","Port In");_newline//1.4_newline var NRHValue="";_newline bcXA=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Item XA");_newline bcXA.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcXA.ActivateField("Text Value");_newline bcXA.ActivateField("Action Code");_newline bcXA.ClearToQuery();_newline bcXA.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='NRH'");_newline bcXA.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcXA.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline NRHValue = bcXA.GetFieldValue("Text Value");_newline bcXA.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Update");_newline if("N"==NRHValue)_newline bcXA.SetFieldValue("Text Value","Y");_newline else_newline bcXA.SetFieldValue("Text Value","N");_newline bcXA.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline//now create a note mentioning new order number under the orig order record_newline func_usCreateOrderNote(strOrderId,"","Change Number Order:" + strNewOrderNum);_newline//submit_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strNewOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode","Deliver");_newline psIp.SetProperty("RenewLock","N"); //[JUHIV][20032014][Defect8546:Extend reservation should not be called for MNP Change MSISDN]_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "CHG_usNUM_usOLI_usNOT_usCREATED";_newline strErrMesg = "Change number order item could not be created.";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ROOT_usOLI_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Root Order Item for item with Id = " + strNPOLIId + " not found.";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "UNHANDLED_usTYPE";_newline strErrMesg = "This type of record is not supported:" + strRecordType + ":" + strRecordSubType;_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ERROR";_newline strErrMesg = e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", strOrderId);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline boAsset=null;_newline bcAsset=null;_newline boOrder=null;_newline bcOrder=null;_newline bcXA=null;_newline bcOLI=null;_newline bsUtil=null;_newline psIp=null;_newline psOp=null;_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcess_usMNP

CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcess_usMNP_usLASTGOOD_us20140227

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usQueryBalanceSummary(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strErrCode="OK",strErrMesg="";_newline var bsUtil,psOp,psIp,p1,p2,p3,p4,boAccount, bcCIP;_newline var strCIPId = Inputs.GetProperty("CIP Id");_newline//for given CIPId go to AIA and fetch the balance the classical VBC query approach does not work _newline//when fired as a part of inbound web service call on siebel_newline try_newline {_newline boAccount = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline bcCIP = boAccount.GetBusComp("CMU Com Invoice Profile");_newline bcCIP.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcCIP.ActivateField("Account Id");_newline bcCIP.ActivateField("Account Name");_newline bcCIP.ActivateField("Currency Code");_newline bcCIP.ActivateField("Name");_newline//this is a profile attr :-( as OOB, MUST use Account Id else fails in wfproc and eai_newline// bcCIP.ActivateField("Service Account Id");_newline bcCIP.ClearToQuery();_newline bcCIP.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strCIPId + "'");_newline bcCIP.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcCIP.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("AccountBalanceSiebelCommsReqABCS");_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline p1=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline p2=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline p3=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline p4=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline p1.SetType("QueryBalanceSummaryReqMsg:ListOfCmuRequestBillingProfileIo");_newline p1.SetProperty("MessageId", "dummy");_newline p1.SetProperty("IntObjectName", "CMU Request Billing Profile IO");_newline p1.SetProperty("MessageType", "Integration Object");_newline p1.SetProperty("IntObjectFormat","Siebel Hierarchical");_newline p2.SetType("ListOfCMU Request Billing Profile IO");_newline p3.SetType("Com Invoice Profile");_newline p3.SetProperty("Id", strCIPId);_newline p3.SetProperty("Account Id", bcCIP.GetFieldValue("Account Id"));_newline p3.SetProperty("Currency Code", bcCIP.GetFieldValue("Currency Code"));_newline p3.SetProperty("Account Name", bcCIP.GetFieldValue("Account Name"));_newline p3.SetProperty("Name", bcCIP.GetFieldValue("Name"));_newline p3.SetProperty("Maximum Number Of Records","20");_newline p3.SetProperty("Service Account Id", bcCIP.GetFieldValue("Account Id"));_newline p2.AddChild(p3);_newline p1.AddChild(p2);_newline psIp.AddChild(p1);_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("QueryBalanceSummary",psIp,psOp);_newline//retrieve from output_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Due Now", psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetProperty("Due Now"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Pending Payments/Adjustments", psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetProperty("Pending Payments/Adjustments"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Unbilled Usage", psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetProperty("Unbilled Usage"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Unresolved Disputes", psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetProperty("Unresolved Disputes"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Balance", psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetProperty("Balance"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Total", psOp.GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetChild(0).GetProperty("Total"));_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode="NO_usCIP_usREC";_newline strErrMesg="No record found.";_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "BAL_usCHECK_usERR";_newline strErrMesg = e.errCode+":"+e.errText;_newline TheApplication().LogError(strErrCode, strErrMesg, strCIPId, "CIP", "BalanceVBCBS", "", "", "", "")_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usQueryBalanceSummary

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20140220 | 1.00 | PPB | First version_newline20140228 | 1.1 | PPB | NP Order ID - removed from mandatory check_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usValidateNPOrder(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strErrCode = "OK";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var strOrderId = Inputs.GetProperty("OrderId");_newline var isRec,strAttrName,strAttrVal;_newline var strAttrListNonNullValues="";_newline var strAttrNameListWithError="";_newline var strAttrErrList="";_newline var strProdNamePortIn= "Mobile Port-In";_newline var boOrder, bcOrder, bcOLI, bcAttr, bcAttach;_newline try_newline {_newline if(""==strOrderId)_newline {_newline strErrCode="MISSING_usORDERID";_newline strErrMesg="OrderId must be provided as an input argument.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline boOrder=TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrder=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("VFQA Source");_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode="ORDER_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg="Order with id " + strOrderId + " not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline if( bcOrder.GetFieldValue("VFQA Source") =="Bulk MNP" )_newline {_newline strErrCode="OK"; _newline strErrMesg="Nothing to validate since this is a Bulk MNP order.";_newline }_newline else_newline {//check OLI To find portin product_newline bcOLI=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Action Code]='Add' AND [Product]='"+ strProdNamePortIn + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode="OK";_newline strErrMesg="Nothing to validate since this is not a NP order.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline//check portin attachment_newline bcAttach_newline bcAttach=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry Attachment");_newline bcAttach.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAttach.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAttach.SetSearchExpr("[AttachmentType]='DNO Verification'");_newline bcAttach.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcAttach.FirstRecord();_newline if(!isRec)_newline {_newline strErrCode="MISSING_usATTACHMENT;";_newline strErrMesg="An attachment must be associated with the NP order with type='DNO Verification'.;";_newline }_newline//check attributes_newline/*_newlineDonor Customer ID_newlineDonor Customer ID Type_newlineDonor Customer Type_newlineDonor Operator_newlineDonor Subscription Type_newlineNP Order ID - not mandatory 1.1_newlineScheduled Port In - this can be null all others must be non-null_newline*/_newline strAttrListNonNullValues="Donor Customer ID;Donor Customer ID Type;Donor Customer Type;Donor Operator;Donor Subscription Type";//1.1_newline bcAttr=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Item XA");_newline bcAttr.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Value");_newline bcAttr.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAttr.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcAttr.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {//check all attributes_newline strAttrName=bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Name");_newline strAttrVal=bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Value");_newline if(0<=strAttrListNonNullValues.indexOf(strAttrName) && ""==strAttrVal)_newline strAttrErrList=strAttrErrList + strAttrName + ",";_newline isRec=bcAttr.NextRecord();_newline }_newline if(""!=strAttrErrList)_newline {//chop off last ,_newline strAttrErrList = strAttrErrList.substring(0,strAttrErrList.length-1);_newline strErrCode=strErrCode + "MISSING_usATTRIBUTE;";_newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Attributes need to be specified [" + strAttrErrList + "];";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline _newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode="NP_usORDER_usVAL_usERR";_newline strErrMesg="Error while validating: " + e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline bcAttach=null;_newline bcAttr=null;_newline bcOLI=null;_newline bcOrder=null;_newline boOrder=null;_newline//if last char is ; cut it off_newline if(";"==strErrCode.charAt(strErrCode.length-1))_newline {_newline strErrCode=strErrCode.substring(0,strErrCode.length-1);_newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg.substring(0,strErrMesg.length-1);_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usValidateNPOrder
